amendatorysection.catchline: Salvage branded certificate of title; nontransferable certificate of title; when issued; procedure; surrender for certificate of title; procedure.
amendatorysection.para: Any person who acquires ownership of a salvage or manufacturer buyback vehicle for which he or she does not obtain a salvage branded or manufacturer buyback branded certificate of title shall surrender the certificate of title to the county clerk or designated county official and make application for a salvage branded or manufacturer buyback branded certificate of title within thirty days after acquisition or prior to the sale or resale of the vehicle or any major component part of such vehicle or use of any major component part of the vehicle, whichever occurs earlier.
